description:
Tearju takes over as the homeroom teacher for Yami`s class, 1-B. It bothers Rito and othe others to see the awkwardness remaining between Tearju and Yami, as well as Mea still resisting Tearju. Rito tries to get Yami and Tearju to make peace, but Yami is obstinate, and his words fall on deaf ears. Then Mea, touched by Rito`s concern, confronts Yami, and her words lead her older sister to a decision...
Source: crunchyroll
